error404.e404_2: If this message keep showing, please contact developer

error500.e500_1: There are 2 reasons for you to see this page
error500.e500_3: If you get this message even if you are signed in, please contact developer
error500.e500_4: 2. This page would be only accessible by account owner

header.test: This service is under maintenance now. It sometimes become unstable.

footer.fanpage: This web site is fan page. And does not have any purpose of profit.

notice.title: Notice
notice.desc: The most recent 3 announcements are displayed

about.title: What is this web site?
about.cont:
You can record your GITADORA skill data and share with other players.
        Please check announcement from Twitter account.

script.title: Update script
script.cont: You can click/touch on script to copy
script.scriptNoLogin: Please sign in first. Script differs to account
script.scriptLogin: URL written differs each user. DO NOT SHARE your URL
script.alert: All the script copied except front letter "j"

howto.title: How to use
howto.desc1: Move to GITADORA homepage, copy and paste script
howto.desc2: Be sure to sign in first before run script
howto.desc4: Select each button to update your data

noplay.desc: This page shows patterns that you have not played

rank.title: Pattern ranking
rank.desc1: Please select difficulty on each music
rank.desc2: After login, you can go to record page when you click on name of music

rankeach.title: Pattern ranking
rankeach.desc: Here's user ranking on this pattern

recent.click: * Touch skill to go to skill table *

search.title: Search result
search.desc: This result does not distinct upper/lower cases

desc.desc1: Private option > Name, profile link disappear
desc.desc3: For exact count, you need to update all patterns

ranking.title: Skill Ranking
ranking.desc: This ranking is only for registered users
ranking.click: * Touch skill to go to skill table *

howto.step1: 1. Add patterns you cleared into 'Favorite' folder from in-game or homepage.
howto.step2: 2. In SIN Updater, press 'GF Favorites' or 'DM Favirotes' button to update these songs.

towerstatus.nodata: No data found. Data can be updated from profile page by account owner.
towerstatus.duplicate: There is possibility of duplication of title
towerstatus.btntop: To the top of the page

login.title: Sign in
login.google: This service only supports Google account login
login.contentAppFailTitle: Unknown error made login sequence fail

body.p2: This error may occurred from Google. Please try from other device, or wait for a second.
body.p3: You can't sign in from private mode like Incognito/InPrivate

join.title: Welcome to Skill Navigator
join.desc: Click on the button below to create and add new user data
join.invalidAccess: Something is wrong. Please contact developer

playcount.desc_3: to show exact my best list

button.title: Shortcut
button.resetdanger: This button will reset all the skill data and CANNOT be restored. Will you continue?
button.countdesc: When you find your play count is not updated after you used updater, please press the button below

detailed.countdesc:
About play count
            * Play count is sum of all number stages (Including stage failure)
            * Others can or cannot see your data via your settings
            * You need all pattern data to check exact play count

towerupdate.alert: It takes maximum 2~3 minutes (normally within 10 sec) and DO NOT leave this page while executing it

profile.click: * Touch skill to go to skill table *

reset.title: About data reset
reset.desc1: This process removes all your data and you can not restore it
reset.desc2s: title, name, GF/DM user data (including skill, all skill, clear time, max clear lv, fc time, max fc lv, exc time, max exc lv, play count), play data on each music (including skill, rank, combo, play time, clear time, rate, score, skill meter, old rate)
reset.desc3: Your account does not removed but you can disconnect GITADORA Info from Google account management
reset.desc4: Google - My account - Account setting - App and web pages - App management - GITADORA Info
reset.desc5: Are you sure to delete all data?

snapshot.desc2: Only you can see this page
snapshot.desc3: (Sharing each skill table via link is available)
